wriggle.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to twist your body from side to side with small quick movements
wriggle.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Stop wriggling and let me put your T-shirt on.
The dog wriggled free and ran off.
wriggle.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to move a part of your body backwards and forwards with small movements
wriggle.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: She took off her shoes and wriggled her toes.
wriggle.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a movement in which you twist your body from side to side
